user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip with my friends in the Rocky Mountains. Can you recommend some scenic trails, camping sites, and nearby restaurants? Also, provide the geocodes for the address '123 Mountain View Road, Denver'.

TaskList.description: Retrieve scenic hiking trails in the Rocky Mountains.
Find camping sites available in the Rocky Mountains.
Get a list of nearby restaurants in the Rocky Mountains.
Fetch the geocodes for the address '123 Mountain View Road, Denver'.
